data.text:
Presentation on theme: "Harry Houdini was born in March 24, 1874. It’s A Boy Harry Houdini’s name was Ehrich Weisz, but then his parents changed it to Harry Houdini when he was."— Presentation transcript:

1

2 Harry Houdini was born in March 24, 1874. It’s A Boy Harry Houdini’s name was Ehrich Weisz, but then his parents changed it to Harry Houdini when he was about three month old.

3

4 When Harry Houdini was six years old he ran away, but then he came back about two or three months later

5 When Harry was eight years old he had a job as selling newspapers and shining shoes.

6 In 1892, Harry’s father, Rabbi Weiss DIED

7 Harry Houdini got married in 1894 to a girl named Beatrice, and she joined Harry’s act as his new partner.

8 In 1895, Harry Houdini joined the Welsh brothers.

9 In 1908, he went in the Milk Can.

10 Harry’s mother and wife DIED in 1913

11 During the first World War in 1917, Houdini tried to enlist in the Army, but he was rejected as being to old at age 43.

12 He wrote Miracle Mongers and Their Methods in 1920. He also wrote Magician the Spirits, and he wrote The Unmasking of Robert Houdini in 1908.
